languages.text: Многотысячная армия пилигримов, почитающих святого Друза, готова устремиться в неизведанный сектор и основать там новую колонию во имя Императора. Чтобы эти пылкие люди не погибли в пути, культ святого Друза нуждается в огромных запасах продовольствия.

traits.locale_text: Многотысячная армия пилигримов, почитающих святого Друза, готова устремиться в неизведанный сектор и основать там новую колонию во имя Императора. Чтобы все эти пылкие люди не погибли в пути от голода, культ святого Друза готов закупать продовольствие в огромных объемах.

languages.text: An army of Drusian pilgrims is planning to travel to an unexplored sector and set up a colony in the name of the Emperor. To ensure that these fervent believers don't die on their journey, the Cult of Saint Drusus requires a huge amount of food.
languages.original_text: Многотысячная армия пилигримов, почитающих святого Друза, готова устремиться в неизведанный сектор и основать там новую колонию во имя Императора. Чтобы эти пылкие люди не погибли в пути, культ святого Друза нуждается в огромных запасах продовольствия.

traits.locale_text: An army of drusian pilgrims are planning a travel into an unexplored sector and set up a colony there. To provide all the fervent believers with sustenance needed for this journey, The Cult of Saint Drusus is willing to buy enormous amounts of food.

An army of drusian pilgrims are planning a travel into an unexplored sector and set up a colony there. To provide all the fervent believers with sustenance needed for this journey, The Cult of Saint Drusus is willing to buy enormous amounts of food.

An army of Drusian pilgrims is planning to travel into an unexplored sector and set up a colony in the name of the Emperor. So that all of the fervent believers don't die from starvation on their journey, the Cult of Saint Drusus is willing to buy enormous amounts of food.

An army of Drusian pilgrims is planning to travel into an unexplored sector and set up a colony in the name of the Emperor. So that all of the fervent believers don't die from starvation on their journey, the Cult of Saint Drusus is willing to buy enormous amounts of food.

An army of Drusian pilgrims is planning to travel to an unexplored sector and set up a colony in the name of the Emperor. To ensure that these fervent believers don't die on their journey, the Cult of Saint Drusus requires a huge amount of food.

An army of Drusian pilgrims is planning to travel to an unexplored sector and set up a colony in the name of the Emperor. To ensure that these fervent believers don't die on their journey, the Cult of Saint Drusus requires a huge amount of food.

languages.text: 一支由圣德鲁苏斯教派的朝圣者组成的大军，正准备前往某片尚未被开拓的区域，以帝皇的名义在那里建立殖民地。为了确保这些狂热的信徒不会在旅途中死亡，圣德鲁苏斯教派需要准备大量食物。
languages.original_text: An army of Drusian pilgrims is planning to travel to an unexplored sector and set up a colony in the name of the Emperor. To ensure that these fervent believers don't die on their journey, the Cult of Saint Drusus requires a huge amount of food.

traits.locale_text: 一支由圣德鲁苏斯教派的朝圣者组成的大军，正准备前往某片尚未被开拓的区域，以帝皇的名义在那里建立殖民地。为了确保这些狂热的信徒不会在旅途中死亡，圣德鲁苏斯教派需要准备大量食物。

languages.text: Un ejército de peregrinos drusianos planea viajar a un sector inexplorado y establecer una colonia en nombre del Emperador. Para asegurarse de que estos fervientes fieles no mueren durante el viaje, el Culto de San Drusus necesita una gran cantidad de comida.
languages.original_text: An army of Drusian pilgrims is planning to travel to an unexplored sector and set up a colony in the name of the Emperor. To ensure that these fervent believers don't die on their journey, the Cult of Saint Drusus requires a huge amount of food.

traits.locale_text: Un ejército de peregrinos drusianos planea viajar a un sector inexplorado y establecer una colonia en nombre del Emperador. Para asegurarse de que estos fervientes fieles no mueren durante el viaje, el Culto de San Drusus necesita una gran cantidad de comida.

languages.text: 大勢のドルスス派の巡礼者たちが、未踏の地へと旅立ち、皇帝の名においてコロニーを作ろうと計画している。熱心な信者らが旅路で力尽きないよう、聖ドルスス教団は大量の食料を準備せねばならない。
languages.original_text: An army of Drusian pilgrims is planning to travel to an unexplored sector and set up a colony in the name of the Emperor. To ensure that these fervent believers don't die on their journey, the Cult of Saint Drusus requires a huge amount of food.

traits.locale_text: 大勢のドルスス派の巡礼者たちが、未踏の地へと旅立ち、皇帝の名においてコロニーを作ろうと計画している。熱心な信者らが旅路で力尽きないよう、聖ドルスス教団は大量の食料を準備せねばならない。

languages.text: Eine Armee von Drusius-Pilgern will in einen unerforschten Sektor reisen und dort im Namen des Imperators eine Kolonie gründen. Um sicherzustellen, dass diese fanatischen Gläubigen auf der Reise nicht sterben, benötigt der Kult des Heiligen Drusus eine gewaltige Menge an Lebensmitteln.
languages.original_text: An army of Drusian pilgrims is planning to travel to an unexplored sector and set up a colony in the name of the Emperor. To ensure that these fervent believers don't die on their journey, the Cult of Saint Drusus requires a huge amount of food.

traits.locale_text: Eine Armee von Drusius-Pilgern will in einen unerforschten Sektor reisen und dort im Namen des Imperators eine Kolonie gründen. Um sicherzustellen, dass diese fanatischen Gläubigen auf der Reise nicht sterben, benötigt der Kult des Heiligen Drusus eine gewaltige Menge an Lebensmitteln.

languages.text: Une armée de pèlerins drusiens prévoit de voyager vers un secteur inexploré et d'y établir une colonie au nom de l'Empereur. Pour s'assurer que ces fervents croyants ne meurent pas en route, le culte de Saint Drusus demande une grande quantité de nourriture.
languages.original_text: An army of Drusian pilgrims is planning to travel to an unexplored sector and set up a colony in the name of the Emperor. To ensure that these fervent believers don't die on their journey, the Cult of Saint Drusus requires a huge amount of food.

traits.locale_text: Une armée de pélerins drusiens prévoit de voyager vers un secteur inexploré et d'y établir une colonie au nom de l'Empereur. Pour s'assurer que ces fervents croyants ne meurent pas en route, le culte de Saint Drusus demande une grande quantité de nourriture.

languages.text: Drususçu seyyahlardan oluşan bir ordu, keşfedilmemiş sektöre yolculuk yapıp İmparator adına burada bir koloni kurmayı planlıyor. Bu coşkun kalabalığın yolda ölüp gitmemesi için Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'nın epey yiyeceğe ihtiyacı olacak.
languages.original_text: An army of Drusian pilgrims is planning to travel to an unexplored sector and set up a colony in the name of the Emperor. To ensure that these fervent believers don't die on their journey, the Cult of Saint Drusus requires a huge amount of food.
